# Master Your Alerts: Introducing the New Notification Center

## Streamline Your Workflow with Customizable, Real-Time Notifications

### **Introducing the New Notification Center: Simplifying Your Day-to-Day Operations**

In today's fast-paced business environment, staying updated without being overwhelmed is crucial. That's why we're excited to introduce the Notification Center, a feature designed to make your interactions with our platform more efficient and less cluttered. Here's how the Notification Center is set to transform your daily operations:

#### **![Screenshot 2025-01-06 at 6.17.02 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202025-01-06%20at%206.17.02%20PM.png?width=449&height=480&name=Screenshot%202025-01-06%20at%206.17.02%20PM.png)**

#### **Centralized Control**

Gone are the days of toggling between multiple modules to check updates. Our Notification Center brings all your notifications—whether they're from Tasks, Training, System Alerts, or Forms—into one unified dashboard. This means you can see everything at a glance, saving you time and reducing the hassle of managing multiple alerts.

#### **Customizable Notifications**

We understand that every user has unique preferences. With our new Notification Customization feature, you have the power to decide which notifications you receive and how you receive them. Choose to get updates via push notifications, in-app alerts, or emails. Even better, you can toggle notifications on or off for specific modules like Tasks or Training, ensuring you only receive alerts that are relevant to you.

#### **Never Miss What's Important**

To guarantee that you never miss critical updates, super admins can set up mandatory notifications that cannot be disabled. This feature ensures that essential information always reaches you, helping you stay on top of urgent matters.

#### **Real-Time and Offline Updates**

Receive notifications instantly with our real-time update system, which doesn't require you to refresh your page or app. Moreover, if you're offline, worry not—missed notifications will be queued and delivered as soon as you're back online, ensuring you never skip a beat.

#### **Efficient Notification Management**

Our new system allows you to mark notifications as read or unread, a status that will sync across all your devices. This feature helps you keep track of what's been addressed and what still needs your attention. Additionally, to avoid notification fatigue, similar alerts, like multiple task completions, will be batched together.

Screen Recording 2025-01-06 at 6.16.32 PM \| HubSpot Video

![Screen Recording 2025-01-06 at 6.16.32 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/custom-video-thumbnails/Screen%20Recording%202025-01-06%20at%206.16.32%20PM-thumb.jpeg?length=1920)

### **How to Get Started with the Notification Center**

1. **Access the Notification Dashboard**: Simply log into your account, and you’ll find the Notification Center in your main menu.
2. **Set Your Preferences**: Customize your notification settings to match your preferences for how and what alerts you receive.
3. **Explore Real-Time Updates**: Start receiving and managing your notifications in real time and across devices without any need to refresh.

Try out the new Notification Center today and see the difference it makes in your daily operations!
